channel.title: Rune Bishop [High Standard Efficiency] With Pictures
channel.description:
[center][u][b][size=15pt]Rune Bishop[/size][/b][/u][/center] [shadow=red,left][b][High Standard Efficiency][/b][/shadow]
[b]Please comment if you have read this post,thank you.[/b]
This is not a 474,503,508,512 etc server.
Here are some updates written in a chronological way.
67*Finished the Dragon Scimmitar special.Correct animation and gfx. 66*Finished of the Whip special. 65*Made many adjustments for the abbysal whip special attack.As well as for the weapon. 64*Added the correct gfx for the abbysal special. 63*Working with the abbysal whip and dragon scimmitar special attack. 62*Finished of magic short bow special attack. 61*Added the void for magic short bow,now you need arrows to cast the special. 60*Started the Magic short bow special. 59*Finished of Dragon Long and Dragon Mace special attack.Perfect voids. 58*Got started on making the Dragonlong sword special attack. 57*Made some adjustments in client.java 56*Added the interface and Gfx(Graphic) method. 55*Got prepared for special attacks.Made a simple handler. 54*Extended herblore.You can now make basic potions. 53*Started on herblore.Identifieing some herbs. 52*You now need rune ess and a tally to runecraft. 51*Started working with some portals. 50*Made runecrafting,basic at abbys. 49*Finished of Firemaking 100% 48*Made simple firemaking.Logs-maple. 47*Smithing 100% completed,Lumbride furns and Al kalrid Furns as well.You need a hammer to smith. 46*Smithing now works with bronze-mitheral. 45*Finished of mining completly and easily thanks to many tutorials on Moparscape.org. 44*Added basic mining and smithing. 43*Created range for npc and player killing. 42*Made perfect draw backs with range. 41*Fixed the range 2h mode and normal mode.You can not hold a shield while equiped with a bow. 40*Added all range requirements.You need arrows to create projectiles. 39*Made range projectiles. 38*Finished of bind,snare and entangle 100% Npc and on players.(Runes are needed to cast this spell on players and npc) 37*Made Wilderness levels.1-50. I have not made all yet,not planning to either,don't ask why. 36*Fixed the snare casted on Lv.50 mage(Runes needed)You can now cast in on a person in the wilderness. 35*Bind now works in the wilderness as well as on a npc. 34*Made basic bind.(Runes needed) 33*You need rune to cast magic spell and teleport as well as enchant. 32*Finished of Magic projectiles:Strikes-waves. 31*Fixed the enchant magic.You can enchant up to onyx 30*Made basic projectile work.(All the strikes) 29*Finished of all teleports.Even Ape Atol 28*Started on Magic.Teleportation. 27*Finaly finished of a bit of fishing,you can now fish sharks and monk fishes. 26*Finished of easy cooking:Shrimp-Mantarays(Including Member items) 25*Extended fishing to lobster pots and harpoons.Tho you can only fish sordfishes and tuna with harpoons not sharks. 24*Added basic membership just for fun. 23*Made cooking,so far this is what you can cook:Shrimp-Lobsters.(Including member items) 22*Made substantial fishing.Working at Lumbrdge and Al Kalrid.(Net,fishing rod and feathers) 21*Made progress with global items,so far i have made some items near the varrock mining area eg.Redberries. 20*Started working with global items. 19*Finished of basic thieving.Now working with profesional assistence. 18*Made Lumbridge-Al Kalrid gate guards.Now you have to pay them 5 gp not 10 gp to get through. 17*Player death control.If you die you get to keep 3 random items. 16*Added some more npc's,now they extend to Lumbridge-Varrock. 15*Started working with Npc Dialouge. 14*Made basic npc thieving. 13*Made better woodcutting standards eg.You have 40% chance on loosing your axe head. 12*Fixed some bugs in thieving stalls. 11*Created stall thieving at Arg. 10*Finished of woodcutting (Willow-Magic) 9*Fixed a lot of npc emotes and player emotes as well. 8*Created some global objects near the cooking entry. 6*Added some npc handling to some Lumbridge npc's such as Men,Goblins and Spiders. 5*Made equipment requirements to most of the weapons and armour. 4*Made basic woodcutting (Trees-Willow) 3*Made a simple starter (25gp,Iron Scimmitar,50 shrimps) 2*Added some npc at Lumbridge 1*Obtained a stable source.Not many updates where made in the source,except for Autospawn.cfg and other basic configration and java files.
Here are some pictures:
[u][b]Range:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/20trp5g.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Magic:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/21jw1s9.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Special Attacks:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2rfsnf9.jpg[/img]
~MoparUnited~

item.title: Rune Bishop [High Standard Efficiency] With Pictures
item.dc:creator: @MoparUnited MoparUnited
item.description:
@MoparUnited wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:245521”][quote author=MoparUnited link=topic=321966.msg2545454#msg2545454 date=1227254224]
I’ll be posting them tommorow,right now i am getting them and uploading.
[/quote]

it wont take 1day? use photobucket thats the fastest,[/quote]
Okay i’l try that thanks for your advice.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MoparUnited MoparUnited
item.description:
@MoparUnited wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Rune Bishop[/size][/center]
[shadow=red,left][High Standard Efficiency][/shadow]

Please comment if you have read this post,thank you.

This is not a 474,503,508,512 etc server.

Here are some updates written in a chronological way.

67Finished the Dragon Scimmitar special.Correct animation and gfx.
66Finished of the Whip special.
65Made many adjustments for the abbysal whip special attack.As well as for the weapon.
64Added the correct gfx for the abbysal special.
63Working with the abbysal whip and dragon scimmitar special attack.
62Finished of magic short bow special attack.
61Added the void for magic short bow,now you need arrows to cast the special.
60Started the Magic short bow special.
59Finished of Dragon Long and Dragon Mace special attack.Perfect voids.
58Got started on making the Dragonlong sword special attack.
57Made some adjustments in client.java
56Added the interface and Gfx(Graphic) method.
55Got prepared for special attacks.Made a simple handler.
54Extended herblore.You can now make basic potions.
53Started on herblore.Identifieing some herbs.
52You now need rune ess and a tally to runecraft.
51Started working with some portals.
50Made runecrafting,basic at abbys.
49Finished of Firemaking 100%
48Made simple firemaking.Logs-maple.
47Smithing 100% completed,Lumbride furns and Al kalrid Furns as well.You need a hammer to smith.
46Smithing now works with bronze-mitheral.
45Finished of mining completly and easily thanks to many tutorials on Moparscape.org.
44Added basic mining and smithing.
43Created range for npc and player killing.
42Made perfect draw backs with range.
41Fixed the range 2h mode and normal mode.You can not hold a shield while equiped with a bow.
40Added all range requirements.You need arrows to create projectiles.
39Made range projectiles.
38Finished of bind,snare and entangle 100% Npc and on players.(Runes are needed to cast this spell on players and npc)
37Made Wilderness levels.1-50. I have not made all yet,not planning to either,don’t ask why.
36Fixed the snare casted on Lv.50 mage(Runes needed)You can now cast in on a person in the wilderness.
35Bind now works in the wilderness as well as on a npc.
34Made basic bind.(Runes needed)
33You need rune to cast magic spell and teleport as well as enchant.
32Finished of Magic projectiles:Strikes-waves.
31Fixed the enchant magic.You can enchant up to onyx
30Made basic projectile work.(All the strikes)
29Finished of all teleports.Even Ape Atol
28Started on Magic.Teleportation.
27Finaly finished of a bit of fishing,you can now fish sharks and monk fishes.
26Finished of easy cooking:Shrimp-Mantarays(Including Member items)
25Extended fishing to lobster pots and harpoons.Tho you can only fish sordfishes and tuna with harpoons not sharks.
24Added basic membership just for fun.
23Made cooking,so far this is what you can cook:Shrimp-Lobsters.(Including member items)
22Made substantial fishing.Working at Lumbrdge and Al Kalrid.(Net,fishing rod and feathers)
21Made progress with global items,so far i have made some items near the varrock mining area eg.Redberries.
20Started working with global items.
19Finished of basic thieving.Now working with profesional assistence.
18Made Lumbridge-Al Kalrid gate guards.Now you have to pay them 5 gp not 10 gp to get through.
17Player death control.If you die you get to keep 3 random items.
16Added some more npc’s,now they extend to Lumbridge-Varrock.
15Started working with Npc Dialouge.
14Made basic npc thieving.
13Made better woodcutting standards eg.You have 40% chance on loosing your axe head.
12Fixed some bugs in thieving stalls.
11Created stall thieving at Arg.
10Finished of woodcutting (Willow-Magic)
9Fixed a lot of npc emotes and player emotes as well.
8Created some global objects near the cooking entry.
6Added some npc handling to some Lumbridge npc’s such as Men,Goblins and Spiders.
5Made equipment requirements to most of the weapons and armour.
4Made basic woodcutting (Trees-Willow)
3Made a simple starter (25gp,Iron Scimmitar,50 shrimps)
2Added some npc at Lumbridge
1Obtained a stable source.Not many updates where made in the source,except for Autospawn.cfg and other basic configration and java files.
